$eref.description: A class breaks renderer symbolizes based on the value of some numeric attribute. The classBreakInfo define the values at which the symbology changes.
$eref.title: ClassBreaks Renderer

___legendOptions.description: A legend containing one title, which is a string describing the renderer in the legend.

___type.description: Specifies the type of renderer used.

___visualVariables.description: An array of objects used to set rendering properties.

___authoringInfo.description: An object containing metadata about the authoring process for creating a renderer object. This allows the authoring clients to save specific overridable settings so that next time it is accessed via the UI, their selections are remembered. Non-authoring clients can ignore it.

___normalizationType.description: Determine how the data was normalized.

___valueExpressionTitle.description: The title identifying and describing the associated [Arcade](https://developers.arcgis.com/arcade/) expression as defined in the `valueExpression` property.

___normalizationField.description: Used when normalizationType is field. The string value indicating the attribute field by which the data value is normalized.

___minValue.description: The minimum numeric data value needed to begin class breaks.

___defaultSymbol.description: Symbol used when a value cannot be classified.

___defaultLabel.description: Label for the default symbol used to draw unspecified values.

___normalizationTotal.description: Used when normalizationType is percent-of-total, this number property contains the total of all data values.

$eref.description: This is a special version of UniqueValue Renderer, which loads uniqueValue infos from a style definition.
$eref.title: UniqueValueFromStyle Renderer

___defaultSymbol.description: The defaultSymbol on the renderer that get assigned to features with no value or features that do not fall within the configured data.

___defaultLabel.description: Default string for the default symbol used to draw unspecified values.

___type.description: Specifies the type of renderer used.

___styleUrl.description: URL that points to the web style definition. Can not be used in conjunction with styleName.

___visualVariables.description: An array of visualVariable objects used for continuous color or size, simple, and unique values with feature opacity.

___field1.description: String value specifying the first field used to render matching values.

___styleName.description: A registered web style name. Can not be used in conjunction with styleUrl.

$eref.description: A unique value renderer symbolizes based on the value of an attribute.
$eref.title: UniqueValue Renderer

___legendOptions.description: A legend containing one title, which is a string describing the renderer in the legend.

___type.description: Specifies the type of renderer used.

___visualVariables.description: An array of objects used to set rendering properties.

___authoringInfo.description: An object containing metadata about the authoring process for creating a renderer object. This allows the authoring clients to save specific overridable settings so that next time it is accessed via the UI, their selections are remembered. Non-authoring clients can ignore it.

___valueExpressionTitle.description: The title identifying and describing the associated [Arcade](https://developers.arcgis.com/arcade/) expression as defined in the `valueExpression` property.

___defaultSymbol.description: The defaultSymbol on the renderer that get assigned to features with no value or features that do not fall within the configured data.

___defaultLabel.description: Default label for the default symbol used to draw unspecified values.

___backgroundFillSymbol.description: Used for polygon features. It can only be used for bivariate types and size rendering.

___field3.description: If needed, specify an additional attribute field the renderer uses to match values.

___valueExpression.description: An [Arcade expression](https://developers.arcgis.com/arcade/) evaluating to either a string or a number.

___fieldDelimiter.description: String inserted between the values if multiple attribute fields are specified.

___field1.description: Attribute field renderer uses to match values.

___field2.description: If needed, specify an additional attribute field the renderer uses to match values.

description: The renderer object contains the drawing information for the operationalLayer. This is a list of links to all the renderer objects.
title: renderer
